comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Should probably be "de Noailles" not a single word. This might be fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anna_de_Noailles. The compiler of www.bucovine.com/en/pages/culture/noailles.shtml clearly thinks so. I don't see a date on the negative. In 1913 (the date of most of the current batches of Bain photos uploaded to Flickr) she would have been 37. This woman looks younger than that to me. However www.remcomp.fr/asmanet/paucc-personnages-celebres-pau.html has a photo of her that looks like the same person to me. If it is her, she was a poet and novelist who was clearly very much part of Parisian intellectual life and has caught people's attention recently. See. for example, annadenoailles.com/ , comtessedenoailles.blogspot.com/ , and www.annadenoailles.org/
